review.summary: Clean and well-structured module initialization file that serves as the public API entry point for the common services package. The file follows Python best practices with proper module docstring, explicit __all__ export list, and single-concern structure. It imports and exports the BaseService class which provides common service patterns for business logic operations.

positive_observations.observation: Uses __all__ export list following project pattern #25 for controlled public API
Clear module docstring providing context about the module's purpose
Single responsibility - only exports necessary public interface
Clean import structure with no circular dependencies
No code duplication or unnecessary complexity

context.tests: No direct unit tests found for this module, though testing __init__ files is not always necessary
context.configuration: No configuration required for this module
